resources.string: What do you want to scan?

ScanSmart is a free application that scans barcodes (including Wifi barcodes) and also uses pictures to extract phone numbers, e-mails and wifi passwords to use them. I would appreciate it if you could help me make it better with suggestions or report to me any problems you had using it.
There is no paid version of the app or any extra features to buy. It also has no ads. If you want to support me, you can do it here:
